abilities.name: search
abilities.description: Searches the internet for a given query and returns relevant results. This function is especially useful when you require up to date information. YOU MUST USE THIS FUNCTION WHENEVER THE USER IS ASKING INFORMATION THAT CHANGES AS TIME PASSES.
abilities.directions: To use this function, call search_function(search_string) and pass a search string as the input. The output will be information related to the search string.

abilities.name: natural_language_task
abilities.description: This functions is capable of performing complex natural language tasks.
abilities.directions: To use this function, call natural_language_function(instructions) and pass the instructions as the input. The output will be the result of the task.

abilities.name: calculator
abilities.description: Performs arithmetic operations on numerical input.
abilities.directions: To use this function, call calculator_function(question) and pass a question as a string. The output will be the result of the calculation.

abilities.name: wikipedia
abilities.description: Returns wikipedia page content for the topic
abilities.directions: To use this function, call wikipedia_function(topic) and pass a topic as a string. The output will be the wikipedia page content for that topic.
